# Awesome UO Scripts - Repository Overview

## Quick Facts
- **Total Scripts**: 754
- **Categories**: 13
- **Documentation**: 100% (770+ README files)
- **Source**: mirror.ashkantra.de/scripts/Sphere/
- **Updated**: 2025-12-07
- **License**: Original licenses preserved

## Categories (13 Total)

| Category | Count | Contents |
|----------|-------|----------|
| **Items & Equipment** | 255 | Weapons, armor, artifacts, cosmetics |
| **Chat Systems** | 88 | Messaging, communication, dialog |
| **Housing** | 54 | Houses, properties, decoration |
| **Magic & Spells** | 52 | Spell systems, effects, casting |
| **Quests & Events** | 61 | Missions, content, progression |
| **Combat & PvP** | 43 | Fighting, dueling, arenas |
| **Travel & Teleportation** | 47 | Moongates, portals, runebooks |
| **Skills** | 36 | Training, abilities, progression |
| **Economy** | 36 | Vendors, banking, trading |
| **NPCs** | 34 | Spawning, AI, vendors |
| **Admin Tools** | 27 | GM commands, management |
| **Effects & Visual** | 11 | Animations, particles |
| **Crafting** | 10 | Alchemy, smithing, tailoring |

## Directory Structure

```
/
├── README.md
├── llms.txt (this file)
├── llms-full.txt (detailed documentation)
├── ARCHIVE_SUMMARY.json
├── catalog_database.json
├── assets/
│   └── ultima_online_logo.jpg
└── ultima_online_scripts/
    ├── Admin_Tools/ (27 scripts)
    ├── Chat_Systems/ (88 scripts)
    ├── Combat_PvP/ (43 scripts)
    ├── Crafting/ (10 scripts)
    ├── Economy/ (36 scripts)
    ├── Effects_Visual/ (11 scripts)
    ├── Housing/ (54 scripts)
    ├── Items_Equipment/ (255 scripts)
    ├── Magic_Spells/ (52 scripts)
    ├── NPCs/ (34 scripts)
    ├── Quests_Events/ (61 scripts)
    ├── Skills/ (36 scripts)
    └── Travel_Teleportation/ (47 scripts)
```

## What is This?

A comprehensive, well-organized collection of 754 legacy Sphere Server scripts for Ultima Online emulation. All scripts are:

- ✅ Organized by 13 functional categories
- ✅ Renamed with meaningful folder names
- ✅ 100% documented with README files
- ✅ Cataloged with complete metadata
- ✅ Compatible with Sphere 0.55 & 0.56
- ✅ Preserved from mirror.ashkantra.de

## Key Features

### Complete Documentation
- Root README with overview and installation guide
- 13 category READMEs with folder trees
- 754 individual script READMEs
- 100% documentation coverage

### Searchable Metadata
- catalog_database.json - Complete script database
- ARCHIVE_SUMMARY.json - High-level summary
- File listings and version info
- Author attribution

### Easy Navigation
- Logical category structure
- Meaningful folder naming
- Clear installation instructions
- Quick-start guides

## Installation Steps

1. Choose a category from `ultima_online_scripts/`
2. Select a script folder
3. Read the README.md inside
4. Copy files to Sphere `scripts/` directory
5. Update sphere.ini if needed
6. Restart your server

## Compatibility

Works with:
- Sphere 0.55i (legacy, most common)
- Sphere 0.56d (modern)
- Sphere 0.54 (older)
- Check individual READMEs for specifics

## Finding Scripts

Browse by functionality:
- **Admin Tools** → Server management
- **Chat Systems** → Player communication
- **Combat & PvP** → Fighting systems
- **Crafting** → Production systems
- **Economy** → Trading & banking
- **Effects & Visual** → Graphics & animations
- **Housing** → Property systems
- **Items & Equipment** → Gear systems
- **Magic & Spells** → Magic systems
- **NPCs** → NPC behavior & spawning
- **Quests & Events** → Content & progression
- **Skills** → Character abilities
- **Travel & Teleportation** → Movement systems

## File Types

Each script folder may contain:
- **.scp** - Sphere script files
- **.txt** - Text documentation
- **.htm** - HTML configuration/docs
- **README.md** - Detailed information

## Attribution

All scripts are **preserved from mirror.ashkantra.de** with deep gratitude for maintaining this invaluable Ultima Online community resource. These scripts represent decades of collective knowledge and development.

Thank you to:
- mirror.ashkantra.de maintainers
- Original script developers
- Sphere Server project
- Ultima Online community

## Repository

- **GitHub**: https://github.com/kaktaknet/awesome-uo-scripts
- **Last Updated**: 2025-12-07
- **Documentation**: README.md, llms-full.txt
